content:
Bed Bath & Beyond is a popular destination for home goods, and they often offer various promotions and sales. As it happens, I can provide you with some information on their current and upcoming sales:

**Current Sales:**

1. **20% Off Entire Purchase**: Bed Bath & Beyond is currently offering a 20% off entire purchase coupon, both in-store and online. This is a great opportunity to stock up on home decor items, kitchen essentials, and more. Use code BBBSAVE20 at checkout or show the coupon in-store.
2. **Buy One, Get One 50% Off**: They're having a BOGO 50% off sale on select kitchen electrics, cookware, and cutlery. This sale is online only and ends soon, so act fast!
3. **Up to 50% Off Bedding**: Bed Bath & Beyond is offering discounts on bedding sets, sheets, comforters, and more. This sale is online only and ends soon.

**Upcoming Sales:**

1. **Spring Savings Event**: Bed Bath & Beyond typically hosts a Spring Savings Event in late March or early April, featuring discounts on a wide range of products, including home decor, kitchenware, and outdoor furniture. Keep an eye on their website or sign up for their email newsletter to stay informed.
2. **Mother's Day Sale**: Expect a sale around Mother's Day (second Sunday in May) with discounts on kitchen appliances, home decor, and more.
3. **Memorial Day Sale**: Bed Bath & Beyond usually offers a sale during the Memorial Day weekend (last weekend in May), featuring discounts on outdoor furniture, patio decor, and summer-themed items.

**Tips and Tricks:**

1. **Sign up for their email newsletter**: By joining their email list, you'll receive exclusive offers, early access to sales, and notifications about upcoming promotions.
2. **Use their mobile app**: The Bed Bath & Beyond mobile app often features exclusive offers, digital coupons, and easy access to sales.
3. **Stack coupons and discounts**: When possible, combine manufacturer coupons with Bed Bath & Beyond's own coupons and sales to maximize your savings.
4. **Check their website for price matches**: If you find a lower price on an item at a competitor's store, Bed Bath & Beyond will price-match it.

Remember to always check the Bed Bath & Beyond website or visit your local store for the most up-to-date information on sales and promotions. Happy shopping!
